thread.title: Customer
thread.title_full: Town Fair Tire Centers, Inc reviewed by Customer

author: Customer
title: Customer
text:
I purchased 4 new General Altimax RT43 tires for my 2010 GMC Terrain. The Hanover, MA manager Tom, was extremely helpful and ensured the installation was quick and thorough.
I would absolutely go to this location again, as well as, any other Town Fair Tire location.
